Hinweis nach dem Bundesdatenschutzgesetz: Information according to the German Data Protection Act: The Data is collected, processed and used due to and for the purpose of §§ 31, 62 to 78 Einkommenssteuergesetz (Income Tax Act) and legal regulation and the Bundeskindergeldgesetz (Federal Child Benefit Act) and the Sozialgesetzbuch (Code of Social Law).
Name: Surname
Name und Vorname des/der Kindergeldberec: Surname and first name of the person entitled to child allowance
Telefonische Rückfrage tagsüber unter Nr: Telephone number during the day in case of query:
Wir versichern, dass alle Angaben wahrhe: We hereby declare that all the information was provided truthfully. The required documents are attached. We are aware that any change concerning the given information has to be reported to the responsible Family Benefits Office.
